import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const KeyboardShortcutsHelp=()=>{const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);// Close on escape key

,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center',marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{margin:0},children:"Keyboard Shortcuts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsVisible(false),style:{background:'none',border:'none',fontSize:'1.5rem',cursor:'pointer',padding:'0.5rem',color:'var(--text-primary, #333)'},title:"Close (Esc)",children:"\u2715"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'grid',gap:'0.5rem'},children:shortcuts.map((shortcut,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',alignItems:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("kbd",{style:{backgroundColor:'var(--border-color, #eee)',padding:'0.25rem 0.5rem',borderRadius:'4px',fontSize:'0.875rem',fontFamily:'monospace'},children:shortcut.key}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},children:shortcut.description})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'1rem',fontSize:'0.875rem',opacity:0.7},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uD83D\uDCA1 Tip: These shortcuts work when you're not typing in input fields."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCA1 Tip: Press ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("kbd",{children:"Esc"})," or click outside to close this window."]})]})]})});};export default KeyboardShortcutsHelp;
